mapper.insert: insert into board_tb (title, content, user_id, hobby_id) values ( #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{hobbyId})
mapper.select: select b.*, nickname, hobby from board_tb as b inner join user_tb as u on b.user_id = u.id inner join hobbies as h on b.hobby_id = h.id order by id desc
select b.*, nickname, hobby from board_tb as b inner join user_tb as u on b.user_id = u.id inner join hobbies as h on b.hobby_id = h.id where b.id = #{id}
